title: Strengthening System Design Practical Skills: Educational Multimedia Utilizing Web-Based Decision Support Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can select at least three optimal educational multimedia resources aligned with instructional objectives using a decision-support system.
Learners can develop a multimedia selection and utilization plan following a six-step process (planning, information gathering, design, selection, implementation, evaluation).
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of selected multimedia with over 80% accuracy based on peer reviews and expert feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
